attributes.action: Allow Group Exercise classes to continue in Tier 3 areas
attributes.additional_details: Group exercise classes are vital for mental as well as physical health. Classes provide a sense of community, & a safe space for people to exercise.  Many people who come to a class as they don't feel comfortable going to a gym, because they have phyiscal needs such as illness or injury and need the guidance and support from a teacher to ensure that they are exercising safely. Classes become part of people's routine & support system, & as such are important for physical and mental health alike.
attributes.background:
Review the rules on group exercise classes in tier 3 areas. 
Group Exercise classes are Covid secure, 
& are safe to run even in tier 3 areas as social distancing & strict hygiene procedures can be adhered to.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555618
